docs.text: SLE is defined as the application of systematic, disciplined, and measurable approaches to the development, deployment, use, and maintenance of software languages — SLEBoK (Software Language Engineering Body of Knowledge) This is a collection of software language engineering (SLE) tools, frameworks and books. Pull requests are very welcome! License To the extent possible under law, Manuel Leduc has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this work. Title image Designed by Freepik .
